title: Strictly's Catherine Tyldesley 'bans hubby from dancing after almost breaking arm'
text:

Catherine Tyldesley's participation in BBC's Strictly Come Dancing was almost in jeopardy, thanks to her husband.

Where some couples have to battle against the Strictly curse, former Coronation Street star Catherine has almost succumbed to over enthusiasm.

The 36-year-old actress has said that her husband, Tom Pitford, is so into her appearance on Strictly that he wants to help her practice her routines when she is home.

For Catherine, who is partnered by professional dancer Johannes Radebe, almost came unstuck though as her husband nearly caused her to have a horrific injury.

Tom wanted to help Catherine with her rumba but while dancing around the garden, he almost broke her arm.

(Image: WireImage)

Catherine revealed the close shave when speaking to The Sun, saying: "He’s desperate to give it a go.

“He got a bit ambitious and then tried to spin me like he has been dancing in competitions for decades and almost pulled my arm out of its socket.

“I was in absolute agony and told him I’d never live down the embarrassment if I was ruled out of Strictly by my own husband's dodgy dance moves."

(Image: PA)

Catherine said that it was the last time they would try such a rehearsal. She said: "I was like, ‘Let’s not do this again, you’re banned’."

Tom has become close friends with her Strictly dance partner and Johannes has said that Catherine is his 'perfect partner'.

At 5ft 8in, Catherine is the right height for 6ft 2in Johannes, who said: "Catherine has this tall posture, so she sometimes looks even taller.

(Image: PA)

“It’s wonderful to dance with somebody who complements my height."

Catherine and Johannes will be hoping they do not scare the judges during Halloween week with their cha cha cha to Scared Of The Dark by Steps.

description: The Strictly curse has been replaced by over enthusiasm with Catherine Tyldesley's husband almost causing tragedy
